Posts.Content: Go to ncbi.nlm.nih.com and check out red reishi mushroom and breast cancer. The mushroom is just that, a food that cures breast cancer and alot of other things. I make it into tea and I have survived stage 4 pancreas cancer for 17 months and feeling great. All organ function normal, all blood work normal including markers this month, I am doing chemo too but 12+ tumors will be checked next week because doctor is stumped and doesn't know what to do, he can't believe it. Â He said NO ONE has survived over 8 months with metastasized pc in his 30+ years as oncologist (fyi; he only gave me weeks to live).
Posts.Title: Calling all alternative cancer treatments experiences...
